reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains concepts clearly and makes difficult topics easier to understand. Great lectures!

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Good professor, but the pace of the class can be overwhelming at times. Weekly quizzes are helpful though.

reviews.subject: Modern Literature
reviews.review: One of the best professors! She brings literature to life, and her classes are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Very difficult course. Dr. Kim is knowledgeable, but the exams are extremely tough, and explanations could be clearer.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Her lectures are thorough, and she is passionate about history. Workload is a bit heavy, but manageable.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: The class material is challenging, and her teaching style can be a bit fast. However, the office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Mind
reviews.review: An inspiring professor with thought-provoking discussions. Made philosophy incredibly interesting.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Content is straightforward but his lectures can be a bit dry. The grading is fair though.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging and approachable. The exams were tough but fair. Great for beginners in psychology.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. The material is hard, and he doesn't make it much easier. You'll need to study on your own.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject. She makes class fun, and the discussions are enlightening.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Great professor with industry knowledge. His classes are difficult but highly rewarding for those willing to put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and passionate about the environment. Her field trips and projects are fun and educational.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: The course is tough, but he explains the material well. You will need to practice a lot outside of class.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: She encourages critical thinking and class debates. The workload can be heavy, but you learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: The subject is hard, and his exams are tricky. However, he's approachable and willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Incredible professor! She is always supportive and encourages creativity. The assignments were enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Law
reviews.review: Great lecturer with real-world experience. His exams are hard, but if you pay attention in class, youâ€™ll do well.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Very engaging lectures. Her passion for art is contagious, and her exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging course, but he makes the complex topics understandable. You need to stay on top of the readings.
